statements: SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE country = 'USA' AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, age FROM customers ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, city, country FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC, city DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY customer_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT city, country FROM customers WHERE age < 25 AND city LIKE 'N%' ORDER BY country, city;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Female' AND country = 'USA' LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM customers WHERE country IN ('Canada', 'South Africa') ORDER BY age DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM customers WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE target_age_group IN ('18-30', '31-50') ORDER BY campaign_id DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, target_gender FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE target_gender = 'Female';
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY last_name ASC
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Male' AND city = 'New York'
SELECT campaign_name, target_age_group FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE target_age_group IN ('18-24', '25-30')
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, city FROM customers WHERE city = 'Los Angeles' ORDER BY first_name DESC
SELECT * FROM customers LEFT JOIN marketing_campaigns ON customers.age = marketing_campaigns.target_age_group
SELECT * FROM customers
SELECT name, age, city FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Male'
SELECT purchase_date, product_name, amount FROM purchases WHERE amount > 100
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, target_city FROM campaigns ORDER BY campaign_id DESC
SELECT customer_id, name, age, city FROM customers ORDER BY age
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, age, city FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, product_name, amount FROM purchases WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name, gender, city FROM customers WHERE gender='Female' AND city='New York';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC, age DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, city FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT customer_id, age, city FROM customers WHERE state = 'California';
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE product_name LIKE '%Shoes%';
SELECT customer_id, education_level, marital_status FROM demographics ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM customers WHERE city='New York' AND gender='Male';
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, d.income FROM customers c INNER JOIN demographics d ON c.customer_id = d.customer_id WHERE d.income >= 50000;
SELECT product_name, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM purchases GROUP BY product_name ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, segment, start_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age, city, state FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, age, gender, city, state FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, city FROM customers WHERE state='California';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, gender, city, state FROM customers WHERE gender='Female';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, d.income FROM customers c JOIN demographics d ON c.customer_id = d.customer_id WHERE d.education_level = 'Bachelor' AND d.occupation = 'Engineer'
SELECT p.product_name, p.total_amount, c.first_name, c.last_name FROM purchases p JOIN customers c ON p.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE p.quantity > 5 ORDER BY p.total_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2023-01-01'
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, d.marital_status FROM customers c JOIN demographics d ON c.customer_id = d.customer_id WHERE d.has_children = TRUE AND c.city = 'New York'
